Extend S4 Methods for Seurat Class

Source: R/Seurat-SCE-methods.R
Seurat-SingleCellExperiment.Rd

Provide limited SingleCellExperiment-like method support.

# S4 method for Seurat,ANY
assay(x, i, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
assayNames(x, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
assays(x, ..., withDimnames = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
colData(x, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat,DataFrame
colData(x) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
colnames(x)

# S4 method for Seurat
counts(object, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
Gene2Symbol(object, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
interestingGroups(object, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat,character
interestingGroups(object) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
mapGenesToIDs(object, genes, strict = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
mapGenesToRownames(object, genes, strict = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
mapGenesToSymbols(object, genes, strict = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
metadata(x, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
metadata(x) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
metrics(object, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
reducedDims(x, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
rowData(x, use.names = TRUE, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
rownames(x)

# S4 method for Seurat
rowRanges(x)

# S4 method for Seurat,ANY
rowRanges(x) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
sampleData(object, clean = TRUE,
  ignoreCols = c("^description$", "^genomeBuild$", "^qualityFormat$",
  "^samRef$"), blacklistCols = c("^G2M.Score$", "^Phase$", "^S.Score$",
  "^ident$", "^old.ident$", "^orig.ident$", "^res[.0-9]+$"))

# S4 method for Seurat,DataFrame
sampleData(object) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
sampleNames(object)

# S4 method for Seurat
weights(object)

# S4 method for Seurat
weights(object) <- value

Arguments

x

Object.
i

Indices specifying elements to extract or replace. Indices are numeric or character vectors, empty (missing), or NULL.

For more information:

help(topic = "Extract", package = "base")
...

Additional arguments.
value

Value to assign.
object

Object.
genes

character. Gene identifiers. It is considered better practice to input the stable gene identifiers from Ensembl (e.g. "ENSG00000000003") and not the (HGNC) gene symbols (e.g. "TSPN6"), if possible.

Value

Match SummarizedExperiment method return.

See also

getMethod("metadata<-", "Annotated")

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • See also
